alert.note: Alert for Butler; Chase; Harvey; Marion; McPherson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 7:55AM CDT until May 15 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern McPherson County in central Kansas... Northern Harvey County in south central Kansas... Southwestern Chase County in east central Kansas... Northern Butler County in south central Kansas... Southern Marion County in central Kansas... * Until 900 AM CDT. * At 755 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Peabody, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Newton, Hesston, Hillsboro, Marion, North Newton, Moundridge, Peabody, Galva, Canton, Florence, Goessel, Walton, Elbing, Burns, Lehigh, Cassoday, Matfield Green, Cedar Point, Newton Airport and Wonsevu. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 32 and 58. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 78 and 101. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
